v2.0.description: Discover Microsoft Azure Compute Functions resources
v2.0.name: Microsoft Azure Functions

v3.0.description: Discover Microsoft Azure Compute Functions resources
v3.0.name: Microsoft Azure Functions

v3.1.description: Discover Microsoft Azure Compute Functions resources

host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser Azure Functions via l'API}
{EN: Template to check Azure Functions using API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Azure Functions Instance using API
host_templates.name: Cloud-Azure-Compute-Functions

information.author: Centreon

description.value:
**Plugin pack to monitor Azure Functions service using RestAPI or AZCLI.**

Available Host template and related Services:

|Cloud-Azure-Compute-Functions-custom|
|---|
|App-Usage|
|Cpu-Time|
|Data|
|File-System|
|Gc-Usage|
|Health|
|Http-Requests|
|IO-Operations|
|Memory|
|Response-Time|
|Status|

This Plugin-Pack provides a Host discovery *provider* to be used with the Host discovery module.

**Plugin-Pack pour superviser les resources Azure Functions via RestAPI ou AZCLI.**

Modèle d\'hôte disponibles et services associés:

|Cloud-Azure-Compute-Functions-custom|
|---|
|App-Usage|
|Cpu-Time|
|Data|
|File-System|
|Gc-Usage|
|Health|
|Http-Requests|
|IO-Operations|
|Memory|
|Response-Time|
|Status|

Ce Plugin-Pack fournit un *provider* Host Discovery pour le module d\'auto-découverte d\'Hôtes

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later
* 20.10.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Azure Functions
